frege.runtime

Interface Applicable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Delayed, Delayed.Value, Fun1, Fun10, Fun11, Fun12, Fun13, Fun14, Fun15, Fun16, Fun17, Fun18, Fun19, Fun2, Fun20, Fun21, Fun22, Fun23, Fun24, Fun25, Fun26, Fun3, Fun4, Fun5, Fun6, Fun7, Fun8, Fun9, Lambda

    public interface Applicable
    Something that can be applied to a value.

    This interface will be implemented by Delayed and Lambda so that apply(java.lang.Object) always returns another Applicable, and hence, for application of lambda bound functions, the following code can be generated:

    f.apply(arg1).apply(arg2)

    and this works no matter if f is actually an unary function that returns another function or a binary function.

    In the latter case, the intermediate Delayed casts the evaluated value to Lambda

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Applicable apply(java.lang.Object arg)
      Apply a Lambda or evaluate a Lazy value and apply the resulting Lambda.
      Lazy result()
      Get the Lazy result of applications.

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        Applicable apply(java.lang.Object arg)
        Apply a Lambda or evaluate a Lazy value and apply the resulting Lambda.
        Parameters:
        arg - the argument
        Returns:
        a Lazy value or another Lambda
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassCastException - if invoked on a Lazy value that does not evaluate to a Lambda

      • result

        Lazy result()

        Get the Lazy result of applications.

        When the last argument has been applied, the result is a Lazy object, which can be obtained through this method.

        Returns:
        the Lazy value
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassCastException - if invoked on an Lambda that is not yet fully applied.
